definitions.definition: To improve something (especially a photograph ), by adding or correcting details, or by removing flaws.
To colour the roots of hair to match hair previously coloured.
To modify a flint tool by making secondary flaking along the cutting edge .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To improve something (especially a photograph ), by adding or correcting details, or by removing flaws.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To colour the roots of hair to match hair previously coloured.
( archaeology ) To modify a flint tool by making secondary flaking along the cutting edge .
